00031    /* 
00032    * Constructor.   
00033    */
00034    NvtDpdVvIntegrator::NvtDpdVvIntegrator(MdSystem& system)
00035    : MdIntegrator(system),
00036      dtMinvFactors_(),
00037      cutoff_(-1.0),
00038      gamma_(-1.0),
00039      sigma_(-1.0),
00040      temperature_(1.0),
00041      cutoffSq_(-1.0),
00042      pairListPtr_(&system.pairPotential().pairList()),
00043      boundaryPtr_(&system.boundary()),
00044      randomPtr_(&system.simulation().random()),
00045      energyEnsemblePtr_(&system.energyEnsemble()),
00046      atomCapacity_(system.simulation().atomCapacity()),
00047      isAllocated_(false)
00048    {
00049       // Note: Within the constructor, the method parameter "system" 
00050       // hides the MdIntegrator::system() method name.
00051 
00052       // Precondition
00053       if (!system.energyEnsemble().isIsothermal() ) {
00054          UTIL_THROW("System energy ensemble is not isothermal");
00055       }
00056       temperature_  = energyEnsemblePtr_->temperature();
00057    }
00058

00060    * Destructor.   
00061    */
00062    NvtDpdVvIntegrator::~NvtDpdVvIntegrator() 
00063    {}

00065    /* 
00066    * Read parameter and configuration files, initialize system.
00067    */
00068    void NvtDpdVvIntegrator::readParam(std::istream &in) 
00069    {
00070       read<double>(in, "dt", dt_);
00071       read<double>(in, "cutoff", cutoff_);
00072       if (cutoff_ > system().pairPotential().maxPairCutoff()) {
00073          UTIL_THROW("Error: Dpd pair cutoff > maxCutoff of pair potential");
00074       }
00075       read<double>(in, "gamma", gamma_);
00076 
00077       // Allocate arrays for internal use
00078       dissipativeForces_.allocate(atomCapacity_);
00079       randomForces_.allocate(atomCapacity_);
00080       dtMinvFactors_.allocate(simulation().nAtomType());
00081 
00082    }
00083 
00084    /* 
00085    * Initialize constants and forces.
00086    */
00087    void NvtDpdVvIntegrator::setup() 
00088    {
00089       // Calculate dtMinvFactors_ array.
00090       double mass;
00091       int nAtomType = simulation().nAtomType();
00092       for (int i = 0; i < nAtomType; ++i) {
00093          mass = simulation().atomType(i).mass();
00094          dtMinvFactors_[i] = 0.5*dt_/mass;
00095       }
00096 
00097       temperature_ = system().energyEnsemble().temperature();
00098       sigma_ = sqrt(2.0*gamma_*temperature_/dt_);
00099       cutoffSq_ = cutoff_*cutoff_;
00100 
00101       system().pairPotential().clearPairListStatistics();
00102       system().pairPotential().buildPairList();
00103       system().calculateForces();
00104       computeDpdForces(true);
00105    }
00106 
00107    /*
00108    * Compute new dissipative and (optionally) random forces.
00109    *
00110    * Dissipative and random forces are stored in separate arrays. 
00111    * If computeRandom == true, recompute random as well as dissipative 
00112    * forces.
00113    */
00114    void NvtDpdVvIntegrator::computeDpdForces(bool computeRandom)
00115    {
00116       Vector e;   // unit vector (r0 - r1)/|r0 - r1|;
00117       Vector f;   // force vector 
00118       Vector dv;  // difference in velocities v0 - v1;
00119       double rsq; // square of distance between atoms.
00120       double r;   // distance between atoms.
00121       double fr;  // magnitude of random pair force.
00122       double fd;  // magnitude of dissipative pair force.
00123       double wr;  // weighting function for random forces.
00124       Atom* atom0Ptr;
00125       Atom* atom1Ptr;
00126       PairIterator iter;
00127       int i;
00128 
00129       // Set all dissipative forces to zero.
00130       for (i=0; i < atomCapacity_; ++i) {
00131          dissipativeForces_[i].zero();
00132       }
00133       if (computeRandom) {
00134          for (i=0; i < atomCapacity_; ++i) {
00135             randomForces_[i].zero();
00136          }
00137       }
00138 
00139       // Iterator over atom pairs
00140       for (pairListPtr_->begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00141          iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00142          rsq = boundaryPtr_->distanceSq(atom0Ptr->position(), 
00143                                         atom1Ptr->position(), e);
00144          if (rsq < cutoffSq_) {
00145             r = sqrt(rsq);
00146             e /= r;
00147 
00148             #if MCMD_DPD_TYPE == 0
00149             wr  = 1.0;
00150             #endif
00151             #if MCMD_DPD_TYPE == 1
00152             wr  = 1.0 - (r/cutoff_);
00153             #endif
00154             #if MCMD_DPD_TYPE == 2
00155             wr  = 1.0 - rsq/cutoffSq_;
00156             #endif
00157            
00158             // Add random forces to atomic vectors.
00159             if (computeRandom) {
00160                fr  = sigma_*wr*randomPtr_->gaussian();
00161                f.multiply(e, fr);
00162                randomForces_[atom0Ptr->id()] += f;
00163                randomForces_[atom1Ptr->id()] -= f;
00164             }
00165 
00166             // Add dissipative forces to array
00167             dv.subtract(atom0Ptr->velocity(), atom1Ptr->velocity());
00168             fd = -gamma_*wr*wr*dv.dot(e);
00169             f.multiply(e, fd);
00170             dissipativeForces_[atom0Ptr->id()] += f;
00171             dissipativeForces_[atom1Ptr->id()] -= f;
00172 
00173          }
00174 
00175       }
00176 
00177    }
00178 
00179    /*
00180    * DPD integrator time step.
00181    */
00182    void NvtDpdVvIntegrator::step() 
00183    {
00184       Vector dv;
00185       Vector dr;
00186       Vector f;
00187       System::MoleculeIterator molIter;
00188       int    iSpecies, nSpecies, atomId;
00189 
00190       nSpecies = simulation().nSpecies();
00191 
00192       // 1st half velocity Verlet, loop over atoms 
00193       Molecule::AtomIterator atomIter;
00194       for (iSpecies=0; iSpecies < nSpecies; ++iSpecies) {
00195          for (system().begin(iSpecies, molIter); molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter)
00196          {
00197             for (molIter->begin(atomIter); atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00198                atomId = atomIter->id();
00199 
00200                // f = (conservative atomic) + random + dissipative force 
00201                f.add(atomIter->force(), dissipativeForces_[atomId]);
00202                f += randomForces_[atomId];
00203 
00204                // Velocity increment dv = force*0.5*dt/mass
00205                dv.multiply(f, dtMinvFactors_[atomIter->typeId()]);
00206                atomIter->velocity() += dv;
00207 
00208                dr.multiply(atomIter->velocity(), dt_);
00209                atomIter->position() += dr;
00210 
00211             }
00212          }
00213       }
00214 
00215       #if 0
00216       #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00217       if (!system().pairPotential().isPairListCurrent()) {
00218          system().pairPotential().buildPairList();
00219       }
00220       #endif
00221       #endif
00222 
00223       // Note: MdSystem().calculateForces() rebuilds the pair list as needed.
00224 
00225       // Calculate all new forces
00226       system().calculateForces();
00227       computeDpdForces(true);
00228 
00229       // 2nd half velocity Verlet, loop over atoms
00230       for (iSpecies=0; iSpecies < nSpecies; ++iSpecies) {
00231          system().begin(iSpecies, molIter); 
00232          for ( ; molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00233             for (molIter->begin(atomIter); atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00234                atomId = atomIter->id();
00235 
00236                // f = conservative + random + dissipative force 
00237                f.add(atomIter->force(), dissipativeForces_[atomId]);
00238                f += randomForces_[atomId];
00239 
00240                // Increment velocity by dv = f*0.5*dt/mass
00241                dv.multiply(f, dtMinvFactors_[atomIter->typeId()]);
00242                atomIter->velocity() += dv;
00243 
00244             }
00245          }
00246       }
00247 
00248       // Recompute disipative force (but not random forces).
00249       computeDpdForces(false);
00250 
00251    }

00253    /*
00254    * Save the internal state to an archive.
00255    */
00256    void NvtDpdVvIntegrator::save(Serializable::OArchiveType& ar)
00257    {  
00258       ar & temperature_;
00259       ar & sigma_;
00260       ar & cutoffSq_;
00261       ar & dtMinvFactors_;
00262       ar & dissipativeForces_;
00263       ar & randomForces_;
00264       serializeCheck(ar, atomCapacity_, "atomCapacity");
00265       //ar & cutoff_;
00266       //ar & gamma_;
00267    }
00268 
00272    void NvtDpdVvIntegrator::load(Serializable::IArchiveType& ar)
00273    {  
00274       ar & temperature_;
00275       ar & sigma_;
00276       ar & cutoffSq_;
00277       ar & dtMinvFactors_;
00278       ar & dissipativeForces_;
00279       ar & randomForces_;
00280       serializeCheck(ar, atomCapacity_, "atomCapacity");
00281       //ar & cutoff_;
00282       //ar & gamma_;
00283    }
